sources.title: Dancing quietly (full movie, full-length sensitive German movie, German complete movies)

metadata.Plot: After many dark years of depression Luca seeks to gain her high school diploma. Her little dog Mata helps her to find motivation and keep a positive attitude towards life. To ensure that she makes it through her maths exam, Luca seals a deal with her classmate Kurt: English in exchange for maths tutoring. He becomes a loyal friend and remains by her side when events spiral down for Luca in her darkest of moments
